abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights apps that help out with attending music festivals.
lead_paragraph: Apps can help fans know when their favorite performers are appearing, navigate the concert site and even learn the words to the songs they might hear.

headline.main: Video Feature: Before the Music Festival, Know the Lineup and the Lyrics
headline.print_headline: Before Heading to the Festival, Know the Lineup and the Lyrics

snippet: Apps can help fans know when their favorite performers are appearing, navigate the concert site and even learn the words to the songs they might hear.
